about_the_game:
THE CAT WHO CHALLENGED THE UNDERWORLD!

An Intense and Frenetic action-platformer where quick reflexes and creativity are essential for survival. Step into the paws of a Cat wearing a Raincoat, who, after dying of fright from a thunderclap, embarks on a dark journey to reclaim his soul. To do so, he must fight hordes of Demons using his trusty Umbrella, advancing ever deeper into the underworld and facing Colossal Bosses along the way.

MASTER THE UMBRELLA, ANNIHILATE DEMONS!

Combat is fast-paced and rewarding, emphasizing strategic decisions and precision. Dodge, counterattack, and use your Umbrella to deflect projectiles, glide between platforms, and unleash devastating blows.

STRUCTURED CHAOS

Face challenging levels filled with brutal enemies and upgrades to transform your playstyle. Want to test your limits? The Infinite Mode offers endless waves of enemies for you to Break Records and refine your Skills.

EVOLVE TO SURVIVE

Defeat enemies to earn:

  • Demon Hearts, used to unlock permanent abilities and upgrades.

  • Blood Drops, used to shop with a Suspicious Vendor.

  • XP Points, used at a Blessed Statue for enhancements.

DON'T FORGET!!

Cats don’t like getting wet...

Are you ready to carve your way through the underworld and reclaim your soul?

name: Hellbrella

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A frantic action game where you are a Raincoat Cat, fighting hordes of demons using an umbrella! Dodge, attack, and upgrade your abilities as you descend into the underworld to reclaim your soul in a vibrant pixel world with an electrifying soundtrack!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
